nodes.title: Introduction
nodes.objective: Gain a general idea of physics.

nodes.title: Read a book
nodes.objective: Find something you like about physics.
nodes.description: Fun books like this show us the potential of what phyiscs can do. They're good to read every now and then.

nodes.title: Reflect
nodes.description:
What did you think of the book?
What was your favorite part?
Why did Yang Dong press the button?

nodes.title: Introduction to Mechanics
nodes.objective: Learn about the motions and behavior of energy.
